derivation: a primitive root; also denominative from H6718 (צַיִד)
outline:
1. to hunt
    1. (Qal) to hunt
    2. (Poel) to hunt, hunt eagerly or keenly
    3. (Hithpael) take provision
strongs_def: to lie alongside (i.e. in wait); by implication, to catch an animal (figuratively, men); to victual (for a journey)
